title: Since Devourer was nerfed from 40 to 25 magic damage, can WW get his W back?
body: WW is slow as all heck in the jungle, its even worse now because of the combination of halving the duration of his W along with greatly increasing the cooldown time.  Can we at least get something back here?  WW has llike 1 ability now.

replies.body: Has a broken sustain, but w/e

in the same patch they hit:
1.skirmishers
2.WW ult base damage
3.WW W
4.Initial devour stacks

all 4 of these things together wre broken, no one is saying otherwise. but to nerf all 4, and quite heavily at that, was overkill. the W is all he'd really need again, TBH. for a jungler who pretty much has no choice but to hard farm to 6, he has quite a slow clear with W in it's current state.

Yeah, I kind of laughed at that too. Sure, WW could one shot squishies without really even being too fed, but to hit everything that allowed him to do it was just overkill. They straight up gutted him.

> [{quoted}](name=NinjaFifer,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gnv7PYPj,comment-id=000000010000,timestamp=2015-04-03T16:46:06.886+0000)
>
> Yeah, I kind of laughed at that too. Sure, WW could one shot squishies without really even being too fed, but to hit everything that allowed him to do it was just overkill. They straight up gutted him.

Ya and they were like "we are taking a gut him and re-evaluate later approach because he is so unhealthy." 10 patches later and still no mention of Warwick. They even buffed Xin Zhao and there was very little reason to pick Warwick over Xin before that.
...Most of the champions you mentioned got buffed in the past 2 patches...

And just look at where they are.

Still Rockin' it out at the bottom of the barrel.

Surely I can't be the only person who sick of riot guting champs with overnerfs then slowly buffing them back to play-ability over the course of 6 months.
Rather that than overbuffing them and slowly #betterNerfIrelia-ing them down to balance.

> [{quoted}](name=Derpy Mike,realm=OCE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gnv7PYPj,comment-id=00000001000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-03T23:24:06.773+0000)
>
> _**Wow**_ Riot gutted a champion and promised compensation buffs but never delivered?!
> 
> {{champion:28}} That's {{champion:268}} completely {{champion:38}} unheard-of! {{champion:45}}
> 
> And some more for good measure...{{champion:84}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:134}} 
> 
> And with his upcoming change to Underdrive I predict {{champion:53}} will join their ranks.

Sort of like Taric when they decided to nerf every single support champ. They made all his stuff scale with armor more, made him FUN to play, then immediately nerfed him to worse than he was before the buff.

Promised to get back to him.

Over a year now.
I mean, Taric is on the table for a full rework.
Right next to Urgot and Yorick~
Until blit'z hook gets smaller and/or slower, he will remain threatening, particularly in bronze and low silver.
I don't think it's good for any champion to be in a state where they aren't threatening, do you?
Doing either of those things will veigar him.

That's his identity. Infinite-sustain basic-attack oriented jungler. No one else in league holds that identity.  Yeah, yeah, Aatrox and Xin Zhao exist, but they don't hold that same core identity like Warwick does.

What you're saying is like saying Braum is too tanky with his E, or Ahri is too mobile with her R.

> [{quoted}](name=Pvt Yong Tai,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gnv7PYPj,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-04-03T16:00:52.826+0000)
>
> That's his identity. Infinite-sustain basic-attack oriented jungler. No one else in league holds that identity.  Yeah, yeah, Aatrox and Xin Zhao exist, but they don't hold that same core identity like Warwick does.
> 
> What you're saying is like saying Braum is too tanky with his E, or Ahri is too mobile with her R.

Yeah the closest you get otherwise is Olaf maybe, but he needs a little build up, and it comes with a cost (build path or ability leveling path).

This is and always has been WW's thing. I mean the old Madred's item was pretty much known as the WW item because of his kit, and that was removed.

This isn't the first time by far (sadly) that riot knee caps items for WW over the years.

Honestly they should probably buff devourer too. How many junglers do you see build that? After it's nerfs everyone built warrior, now it's either warrior or cinderhulk every game.  Devourer needs to go back to at least 30 base damage or if not do bonus damage to jungle creeps like feral flare did.

You're telling me.

When's the last time you've ever seen an AP jungler get magus? Probably never, considering it has no mana regen (and blue buff is never a guarantee with greedy midlaners on BOTH teams).

Diana

Nidalee

Fiddlesticks

?????

Haven't seen a Diana in a loooong while :/ wouldn't she benefit more from devourer with her aa reliance?

Nidalee, I'll give you. Though I should have mentioned Fiddlesticks, because he's the only jungler I've seen build magus :/

Still not sure on Diana. Nashor's tooth would give 20% cdr, and she's probably need some defense items that would likely give cdr as well.
You've never played Diana have you?

> [{quoted}](name=SpecterVonBaren,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gnv7PYPj,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-04T16:57:00.384+0000)
>
> You've never played Diana have you?

I have, but she feels more like a burst fighter, not to mention her passive... makes me feel like she could use devourer effectively and some cdr defense items since most of her spells (sans her Q) screams "melee!".

> [{quoted}](name=tombdragon,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Gnv7PYPj,comment-id=000400000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-04-05T00:22:47.974+0000)
>
> I have, but she feels more like a burst fighter, not to mention her passive... makes me feel like she could use devourer effectively and some cdr defense items since most of her spells (sans her Q) screams "melee!".

She's burst - which exactly why magus fits her better than devourer (the AP makes her Q damage hit harder, and the 20% CDR means her shield and E are up more often). 

Devourer leaves her in a fight longer when she needs to get in, do damage and get out.

Devourer - Magnus is so tasty on Udyr.

But then people expect you to be the sole tank and it goes downhill from there.

I agree that they could probably give him some more power back. At first I was okay with the nerfs because from the way they talked about it, it seemed like his rework was right around the corner but its been a couple months now and no rework...

Devourer etc released
Warwick is really strong
Warwick is nerfed
Devourer is nerfed

Wat

Restore the duration and cooldown on W, but remove the team buff.  Instead, give WW a Cleanse when he activates W.  When I'm playing Warwick, at the start of every team fight, people mindlessly drop ignite and exhaust on Warwick, just because he's WW.  There should be more thought involved for both Warwick and the enemy- should WW use W to get the AS buff and use up the Cleanse at the start of the fight, or wait until he's debuffed?  More gamey-ness.

This happens every time the gameplay/items shift to favor a new champion.

First the champions gets nerfed to bring them in line, then the items get nerfed, leaving the champion double nerfed. Just look at what happened to Olaf when HP tanks were powerful.
I think Devourer itself needs a small buff. You rarely see anyone get it anymore. It feels too slow now outside of  low-ELO games. I almost never see it in competitive either.
honestly i would like to see him get his ult base back too. he feels alot weaker than last season, especially in his lategame dueling power, which he used to shine in.

God they overdid that nerf.

I want them to give him something again.
YES PLASES!! RITO FIX MY OLD MAIN!!!! I'm having to find a new one now cuz he is broken and dead!

Nerfing his W was retarded.
It had nothing to do with the synergy he had with devourer/skirmisher.
WW needs some love, unfortunately it's not likely to happen until he gets reworked.
I honestly wish they would just completely rework him. I never see him played as is.

and his ult damage

just revert the last nerfs that were unnecessary after the item got nerfed
I would rather have the damage nerf on his ult reverted

With {{champion:19}}'s rework scrapped it would be nice for some buffs.  I would love for Hunters Call to be buffed up again I will even be okay with them removing the attack speed buff to allies if they buffed it.

Who knows. It's riot. They probably don't want people to buy him or skins, until they finally get finished with their rework of him and then they'll give him buffs for people to get him, skins, then nerf him down because "lol melee -zed/lcsbigplays"
Warwick is just utter garbage right now and I find him to be pretty much unplayable. Needs a rework badly.
They also said yorik was getting a rework bout 3 years ago I believe. Still waiting.

I think the real problem is this:

Top Junglers: Sejuani, Amumu, Volibear, Hecarim, Nautilus, Skarner, Nunu, Sion, Rek'Sai, Fiddlesticks, Maokai, Fizz, Rammus, Dr. Mundo

Notice that none of these junglers actualy use devour and with a kinda logical reason:

* Recipe: {{item:1042}} +  {{item:1042}} 

Right now devour is the only enchament that exist out basic componements. This delayed powerspike prevent this to outshines their counterparts.

Whe just need this:

* Recipe: {{item:1042}} + {{item:1042}} 
* Unique Passive: +15 magic damage on hit

AP warwick also needs a compensation buff for dfg removal

As for those saying he is being reworked- Morello promised a WW rework in Post Season 3. It hasn't happened yet. So don't hold your breath

maybe he does need a buff but Skirmisher's Sabre was reworked from a strong item to a item that i'd never buy due to ww and yi being strong with it so because of them we lost a good jungle item that only needed a few changes to be in a good place. (in other words i don't like them)

as for buffs to {{champion:19}}  i think they could give him a buff to his w and bring back the old skimishers sabre and nerf yi and other champs that are too good with it early to compensate for bringing it back because atm skirmishers sabre and Poacher's Knife are totally out classed by Stalker's Blade and Ranger's Trailblazer

as for devourer i think it's in a good place it's a late game scaling item so it makes sense that it's a weaker early compered to the other jungle items
Probably wont because Riot has said many time recently that they have a rework planed for him. So probably no changes any time soon
You know, this happens a lot. This jungle item gets retuned, and retuned, and nerfed, then returned, and nerfed repeatedly. And it's always master yi and WW's fault. HMMMMMMM

He is still alright, I mained him in Season 4 (170 ranked game on him mostly in Gold) and still play him alot. In my opinion W has always had a lot of hidden power as you could just press it for free assists if you saw your teammates are about to kill someone cause the range is really huge, lategame it gave a 40 percent attack speed buff for 10 seconds to all 4 of your teammates, that is pretty ridiculous to be honest. So I am fine with the nerfs on W but they should really give him back the 250 base damage on his ult, that is what hurt him a lot in my opinion and totally destroyed Lanewick.
